game.shortDescription: You died, but I got good news and bad news for you. The good news - you have been resurrected, the bad news - you have been resurrected by a necromancer who has some "special" plans for you (although it might not be "bad news" at all...)
game.shortDescriptionEn: You died, but I got good news and bad news for you. The good news - you have been resurrected, the bad news - you have been resurrected by a necromancer who has some "special" plans for you (although it might not be "bad news" at all...)
